description:
Hisone keeps flight training with the dragon. One day a long-haired Ikushima Hiroki appeared out of nowhere and touched all over Hisone`s body. He is a developer of pilot suits and got motivated to create a new suits for Hisone by witnessing she was swallowed by the dragon. On the other hand, Hisone`s rival Nao keeps teasing her out of spite not being chosen by the dragon, but she mistook that Nao likes her. While shortening the distance to the dragon, Hisone starts thinking it needs a name.
Source: Official page

titles.title: Dragon no Namae wa Masotan ni Shimasu
ドラゴンの名前はまそたんにします
